alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 12:49PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval and northwestern Jim Wells Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1248 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alice Acres, or over Alice, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alice, San Diego, Ben Bolt, Tecalote, Alice Acres, Rosita and Lake Alice. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 666 and 682. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
